title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 160.23 - Food and beverages
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 160.23 - Food and beverages

State Regulations

Food and beverages are not to be prepared, kept or sold in
the licensed premises. However, such prohibition shall not apply where such
foodstuffs are prepared or kept in a room adequately ventilated with exhaust of
fumes away from the public area and completely separate and apart from the
workplace, or in the case of beverages which are kept in covered
containers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19

160.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
